text: Nias Hefti (born 18 December 1999) is a Swiss professional footballer who plays for FC Thun as a leftback. ==Professional career== A youth product of St. Gallen, Hefti began his senior career on loan with FC Wil in the Swiss Challenge League, before transferring to FC Thun in 2019. Hefti made his professional debut with Thun in a 2-2 Swiss Super League tie with Neuchâtel Xamax on 20 July 2019. ==Personal life== Hefti is the brother of the footballer Silvan Hefti. ==References== ==External links== * * SFL Profile * SFV U18 Profile * SFV U19 Profile * SFV U20 Profile * SFV U21 Profile Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from Rorschach, Switzerland Category:Swiss footballers Category:Switzerland youth international footballers Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Swiss Challenge League players Category:FC Thun players Category:FC Wil 1900 players Category:FC St. Gallen players Category:Association football fullbacks
